body:
Wait a sec

If Tony is supposed to appear in Captain Marvel and its suspected that Carol is going to be the one who saves him during Endgame, what do you think their reunion is going to be like? A bunch of where have you beens from Tony? A how the hell did you get into space from Carol? Just think of the possibilities.

summary: an OC i created like...yesterday...instead of writing a ten-page paper that’s due in two weeks... hnnngh procrastination ...
caption:
an OC i created like…yesterday…instead of writing a ten-page paper that’s due in two weeks… hnnngh procrastination

Anyway, her name’s Jaya Lopez, she’s latino-indian and a BIG lesbian. Enter Carol Danvers :)

Also, space and time displacement is always fun!

summary: Why not wait until 2021 for the 4th Avengers Film? Why not wait until X-Men, Fantastic Four, Deadpool and his X-Force,...
body:
Why not wait until 2021 for the 4th Avengers Film? Why not wait until X-Men, Fantastic Four, Deadpool and his X-Force, Daredevil, The Punisher, Aldrif “Angela” Odinsdottir, Ghost Rider, and the Rest of Each and Every Marvel Heroes are both invited to MCU and Team Up with the Avengers to Stop Thanos for Last and Final Time? (A.K.A. Avengers: Assemble)

Killing Off Steve “Captain America” Rogers, Tony “Iron Man” Stark, Bruce “Hulk” Banner, Thor, Natasha “Black Widow” Romanova, and Clint “Hawkeye” Barton is WAY TOO EARLY. Save it until 2033 with the End of MCU or the Time when Comic Book Movies began to Stale (Not just Marvel Movies, but also DC Movies). That inspires me to Say ‘I rather watch Batman v. Superman: Dawn of Justice instead of Avengers: Endgame’. Both Looper and These Annoying Marvel Trolls on Twitter & YouTube are getting on my Nerves. Which it will cause to Pull the Justice League Card by Boycott Avengers: Endgame with me saying ‘No Review, I Refuse’.

Releasing Avengers: Endgame on a same year with Captain Marvel will probably give me a Heart Attack because I want the 4th Avengers Movie to be Release 3 Years after Infinity War, just like Avengers in 2012 and Age of Ultron in 2015. These Annoying Marvel Trolls on YouTube and Twitter have gotten even more Stupid.

If these Stupid Marvel Fans are gonna keep Spoiling Avengers: Endgame with these Heroes Dying Controversies. It will Hurt Avengers: Endgame‘s Box Office Result and while Captain Marvel, Shazam, and Spider-Man: Far from Home will take the Lead at the Box Office. I not just Hate DC Fans, but I also Hate Marvel Fans.


P.S:

1. Both Marvel Fans and DC Fans are both Idiots and Dictators.

2. Q: Speaking of refusing to watch Avengers: Endgame due to Heroes Dying Controversies, does that happen before with Other Movies? (Don’t count Justice League)

    A: Yes, some People did refuse to Watch Star Wars: The Last Jedi in Theaters back in December 2017 due to some Spoiling Controversies. While Star Wars: The Last Jedi did Succeed at the Box Office for Most Countries, Star Wars: The Last Jedi did Flopped at the Box Office in China.

3. Looper needs to Shut Up and Stop trolling People by Spoiling Movies like Star Wars: The Last Jedi and Avengers: Endgame.

4. Both Marvel and DC’s Superheroes will Never Die. They’ll keep getting Resurrected, not just Superman and Spider-Man.

5. Either the Russo Brothers needs to Stop Trolling People over Avengers: Endgame or they (The Russo Brothers) should get Fired from Disney and Marvel Studios. (Both Warner Bros and DC better not Hire the Russo Brothers if they got Fired from Disney and Marvel Studios)

summary: In Shazam! #2, we get a look at the bedrooms of Billy Batson and his foster siblings, which provide a brief shorthand of their...
caption:
In Shazam! #2, we get a look at the bedrooms of Billy Batson and his foster siblings, which provide a brief shorthand of their personalities and interests (Freddy being a superhero fanboy, the relatively newly arrived Billy only having his tiger backpack etc. etc.).

Apparently Mary is a Lady Gaga fan.
